pr_title: CORE: Check that Member and Group are from the same VO

timeline.message:
CORE: Added check on same VO origin in member-group methods

- As we have multiple checks on same VO origin when working
  with group-resource or member-resource methods, we were missing
  check on member-group methods. A few implemented own check.
- New check method was added in AttributesManagerBl and is generally
  used when working with member-group attributes, exception then
  propagates into other managers, where its usually considered as
  (converted to) InternalErrorException or ConsistencyErrorException.
- Fixed test which were using members and groups from different vos.
REGISTRAR: Fixed test for member vo matches group vo

timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: Why are you adding exception MemberGroupMismatchException to the methods, where is no control of it?
timeline.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: Its enforced by the calling getAttributes(sess, member, group) within the method, but you are right that we should check it, since for the case of non-empty attrNames it wouldn't be checked at all.
replies.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: It is not just in this method. So it was more a rhetorical question. If they need to have this check just because of under-layer method, then it is ok.
replies.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: Ok. I'll check other methods, to be sure check is not skipped like it was there.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
CORE: Added check on member-group mismatch to getAttributes()

- getAttributes(group,member,resource,attrNames,workWithUserAttributes)
  now explicitly checks on member-group mismatch. It previously
  checked only in the case, that attrNames were empty (using
  subsequent call to getAttributes(member,group).
  Now we check it at the method start.
- Removed forgotten comment from the tests.

CORE: Added more member-group checks and improved RPC javadoc

- We now check member-group relation also for getAttributeById()
- Added some necessary exceptions in the RPC javadoc of changed
  methods. Overall whole RPC javadoc of AttributesManager should
  be improved.

timeline.bodyText: I think you can move the check before the if.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

replies.bodyText: Thanks for noticing, I fixed it and added lazy loading of user object for later checks.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
CORE: Removed code duplicity in checkAttributeSemantics()

- We can have check on same vo for member and group at the method
  start and not twice inside both branches of IF later.
- Lazy load user object to save up 1 query if we don't pass
  user attributes to the method.
